Summary:
Dedicated and enthusiastic Frontend Developer with a strong
foundation in web development and a passion for creating visually
appealing and user-friendly interfaces. Proficient in HTML, CSS, and
JavaScript, with a solid understanding of frontend frameworks and
libraries like Reactjs. A quick learner with excellent problem-solving
skills and a collaborative mindset. Seeking an opportunity to
contribute to a dynamic team and gain practical experience in the
field

Projects.Description:
Created an static webpage using HTML and CSS. I have successfully built
responsive and visually appealing webpages. With a focus on clean code
and attention to detail, I strive to deliver user-friendly experiences.

Created a user-friendly animated webpage using HTML and CSS. With a
solid understanding of front-end development principles, I am
dedicated to creating visually stunning and seamless animations that
bring websites to life.

Created a user-friendly animated landing webpage using HTML5 and
CSS,for learning purposes. I specialize in crafting captivating and
dynamic landing animated webpages.
By utilizing animations, transitions, and modern design techniques, I aim
to deliver impactful user experiences that leave a lasting impression.

Certifications.Certification_Title: HTML5 and CSS3 basic to advance course
